[Groovy] Class HibernateIndexBuilder

java.lang.Object
  HibernateIndexBuilder

class HibernateIndexBuilder

Small DSL for defining database indexes. Sample usage: static indexes = { index_name 'first_column', 'second_column', '...' second_index '...' }

Authors:
Kim A. Betti
